experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: Simplifying Inventory management, allocation and fulfilment for enterprises.
experience.description_html: Simplifying Inventory management, allocation and fulfilment for enterprises. <!---->

experience.title: Product Analyst
experience.description: Was responsible to improve the reporting structure of all departments with the final purpose of efficiency improvement. In SAP ERP solution, they were facing communication and motivation issues because of redundancy and inefficiency in data and data flow. As a part of the Product team, first, I worked with the Material Management Department, where I worked on the cleansing of dataflow and remove redundancy in the system. After that, I made a dashboard for the Head of Department to analyze all the KPIs at once. Then I worked with Plant and Machinery department and made Material info. Dashboard to track the live status of assets and hundreds of vehicles. Then I've worked with the Project Management team, and we've set some unit measurements for every project in order to improve the budget planning and tendering process by doing trend analysis and linear regression. Parallelly I've worked with the Master Data Management team for generating and maintaining the data-flows for all the departments.
experience.description_html: Was responsible to improve the reporting structure of all departments with the final purpose of efficiency improvement. experience.title: Technical Lead
experience.description: Responsible for the success of VeriSecure product from the technical POV. Designed a robust and scalable software architecture for a new serialization product. Worked on an agile pharmaceutical logistics software solution. The overall goal was to make the pharma supply chain digital-ready.
